results.name: When will you meet your soulmate (QUIZ)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or compatible 1.0 GHz processor or higher (multi-core processor supported)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
